142.content: In Voltron legendary defenders according to the storyline Pidge is a female
142.title: Pidge

choices: She begins to feel very hungry
1422.content: "Careful... careful..." said the young scientist under her breath as she put a few drops of some chemical into the beaker using an eyedropper. She had to be extremely careful, as this was a highly volatile mix of chemicals, and even one drop too much could potentially..."HEY THERE PIDGE, WHAT'S GOING ON?!?" shouted Lance, running into Pidge's lab, and subsequently terrifying the young brunette scientist. "AAAH" she shouted, and accidentally spilled far too much chemical into the beaker, creating a mini-explosion all over Pidge's face. "Dang it, Lance!" Lance, being terrified of the young genius took this opportunity to run away as fast as he possibly could. As Pidge began to wipe off the mixture from her face, she began to feel slightly odd.
1422.title: Pidge's science experiment gone wrong... or right?

14221.content: As she wiped the chemicals off, her stomach began to make odd noises. "It's probably nothing" she thought, but, as with all stories in this genre, it wasn't nothing. As her stomach rumbles, she begins to feel very full, as if she'd just eaten a full meal. She looked down to inspect herself. It was in that moment that she noticed that she really hadn't escaped from her accident completely unscathed. Her stomach begun to rise like dough in an oven, pushing against her green jacket. It wasn't just her stomach, but so far, it was the most noticeable change, seeing as how she had little-to-no breasts. Pidge was at first horrified about this development, but once the initial shock of it was gone, her curious nature begun to shine through. She rubbed her new swelling belly, which had to be at least ten pounds at this point. To Pidge's shock, the new flab felt extremely pleasurable to touch. Around this point her initial weight of 94 pounds was just a dream, her being at around 124 now and still growing. Had she not been so consumed with feeling her new swelling body, she would have probably been thinking "when will this growth stop?" But alas, right now, she was too busy exploring her new flab to care about much else. After another twenty minutes, she had grown to roughly twice her initial size, clocking in somewhere in the 180 range. However, she was too busy masturbating to notice how big she was.
14221.title: Pidge pudge

142212.content: "Oh my god," the brilliant young scientist said. "I've never felt so good!" Her body was still rapidly plumping up, with her weight now being around 190. As 200 came and went, she was truly enraptured by just how big she could potentially get. She decided to help move things along. The potion which initially caused her growth was still sitting on the table. "I wonder..." Pidge took the potion in her hand and looked at it. "Perhaps if I drink this, I will get bigger." She puts the beaker up to her lips and drinks. Suddenly, she feels a strange feeling, not unlike the one she felt before she grew fatter. Only, this time, it was much stronger. She began to grow, quicker and quicker, reaching 250 in seconds. Quicker and quicker she grew, all the while enjoying herself far too much. She looked at her swelling girth. 300, then 350, then 400, 450, it seemed as if her growth was truly endless. Where will it end?
142212.title: She keeps growing

info.brief_description: 5 possible females from the Voltron universe will either willingly or not gain weight
info.description:
For those who do not know of Voltron Here's the new official website http://www.voltron.com/



This is a fanfiction female weight gain fantasy adventure based on the animated television series of Voltron

The most popular Version being The Lion Force of Voltron the Defender of the Universe

I do not claim ownership of any version of Voltron or it's based Anime known as

Beast King Go Lion


The 4 animated television series and the 5 possible weight gainers are

Original 1984 to1985 Lion version Voltron the Defender of the Universe Series

Original Princess Allura
Princess Romelle the Cousin of Princess Allura
Queen Merla evil version or good

the optional weight gainer is Haggar the which

1998 to 2000 first CGI Lion version Voltron the Third Dimension series

Young Adult Princess Allura
the optional weight gainer is Haggar the which

2011 to 2012 combine traditional animation with CGI new Lion version Voltron Force series

Adult Allura Princess to Queen
Larmina regarded niece of Allura
Haggar not available


Voltron Legendary Defenders 2016 combination updated CGI and traditional animation

Young Adult Princess Allura
Pidge
Haggar is available


The cause of weight gain can be

standard eating willingly or forced
or
technology used by the good or evil maybe willingly or forced
or
supernatural primary possibly for this is Haggar

one rule

Don't take it beyond nudity or suggestive behavior for Larmina of Voltron Force and Pidge of Voltron legendary Defenders.

Unless you somehow age them into a young adult version of themselves.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Princess Allura Princess Romelle and Queen Merla and if you decide even Haggar the which of planet Doom if you decide complete nudity with suggestive behavior is accepted.

rule two
health beauty strength to move is to increase not decrease

Rule three
there is to be no turning into a shapeless blob of fat, no death. no pregnancy, no other version of expansion. outside of weight gain


You may provide the weight gain adventure or add to my when i provided one
